Photo: Gustavo Caballero, Getty Images For ESPN Image 36 of 36 Watch DJ Khaled Snapchat with this adorable HTown kid 1 / 36 Back to Gallery DJ Khaled is this year's Super Bowl MVP.
The Snapchat king has been everywhere over the last few days, including closing out Bruno Mars' Club Nomadic set, greeting fans at Spec's, a charity basketball game and the ESPN and Maxim parties.
And one 7-year-old fan got his own major key moment.
Anthony "Htown Kid" Guidry earned a spot on Khaled's immensely popular Snapchat after impressing the superstar Saturday afternoon in Houston.
The seven-year-old rapped a bit of Khaled's "I Got the Keys" -- and a star was born.
24K MAGIC: Bruno Mars brings old-school sparkle to Club Nomadic
More than 2,000 fans showed up at the Spec's on Smith to see Khaled, including several minors. The store wouldn't allow them in, so Khaled ventured outside to greet the kids.
"The day before he was like, 'Tomorrow's DJ Khaled!' He knew that Saturday was it," says Yvonne Guidry, Htown kid's mom and a local blogger. She's also a lifestyle specialist with DeLeón Tequila and was working the event.
"(Khaled) was heading out, and I had to rush to escort him out. I'm running back there, and I look at Anthony like, 'Hurry up!' that's when I grabbed my camera.
"It was cute. A little moment for him."
Click through above to see photos of DJ Khaled's Houston tour.
